ï»¿I want you all to know that I am the daughter of an immigrant.
My father fled religious persecution in Nazi-occupied France.
And I'm an American patriot and I love this country.
And because I love this country, I am horrified by its blemishes.
And this immigrant ban is a blemish and it is un-American.
Our guilds are unions of storytellers,...
...who always welcomed those from the nations and of varying beliefs...
...who wish to share their creativity with America.
And we will fight for them.
